# hamsci-mon Documentation

Welcome to the hamsci-mon docs. This site covers getting started, offline usage, the user interface, and multiple deployment options.

- Interactive orthographic globe (D3 + TopoJSON)
- Offline capable (vendored JS and map data)
- Local file APIs for development
- Responsive UI with theme persistence
